lang.codes: EN-Bru = English Brunei; EN-Phil = English Philippines; EN-Sing = English Singapore; ID = Indonesian; JAP = Japanese; MAL = Malaysian; TH = Thai; VT = Vietnamese

gpaq1.description: In the past week, on how many days have you done a total of 30 minutes or more of physical activity, which was enough to raise your breathing rate. This may include sport, exercise, and brisk walking or cycling for recreation or to get to and from places, but should not include housework or physical activity that may be part of your studying
gpaq1.codes: 0 None, 1 1 day, 2 2 days, 3 3 days, 4 4 days, 5 5 days, 6 6 days, 7 7 days

gpaq2.description: In the past week, on how many days did you watch television, play electronic games, or use the computer/mobile phone/tablet (other than for homework/study) for a combined total of less than 2 hours per day
gpaq2.codes: 0 None, 1 1 day, 2 2 days, 3 3 days, 4 4 days, 5 5 days, 6 6 days, 7 7 days

P1.description: Does your course involve vigorous-intensity activity that causes large increases in breathing or heart rate like carrying or lifting heavy loads for at least 10 minutes continuously?

P2.description: In a typical week, on how many days do you do vigorous-intensity activities as part of your course/study?
P2.codes: 0 None, 1 1 day, 2 2 days, 3 3 days, 4 4 days, 5 5 days, 6 6 days, 7 7 days

P3a.description: Hours of vigorous-intensity activities at university on a typical day

P3b.description: Minutes of vigorous-intensity activities at university on a typical day

P4.description: Does your course involve moderate-intensity activity that causes small increases in breathing or heart rate like brisk walking or carrying light loads for at least 10 minutes continuously?

P5.description: In a typical week, on how many days do you do moderate-intensity activities as part of your course/study?
P5.codes: 0 None, 1 1 day, 2 2 days, 3 3 days, 4 4 days, 5 5 days, 6 6 days, 7 7 days

P6a.description: Hours of moderate-intensity activities at university on a typical day

P6b.description: Minutes of moderate-intensity activities at university on a typical day

P7.description: Do you walk or use a bicycle (pedal cycle) for at least 10 minutes continuously to get to and from places?

P8.description: In a typical week, on how many days do you walk or bicycle for at least 10 minutes continuously to get to and from places?
P8.codes: 0 None, 1 1 day, 2 2 days, 3 3 days, 4 4 days, 5 5 days, 6 6 days, 7 7 days

P9a.description: Hours walking/bicycling for travel on a typical day

P9b.description: Minutes walking/bicycling for travel on a typical day

P10.description: Do you do any vigorous-intensity sports, fitness or recreational activities that causes large increases in breathing or heart rate like running or playing football for at least 10 minutes continuously?

P11.description: In a typical week, on how many days do you do vigorous-intensity sports, fitness or recreational activities?
P11.codes: 0 None, 1 1 day, 2 2 days, 3 3 days, 4 4 days, 5 5 days, 6 6 days, 7 7 days

P12a.description: Hours doing vigorous sports/fitness on a typical day

P12b.description: Minutes doing vigorous sports/fitness on a typical day

P13.description: Do you do any moderate-intensity sports, fitness or recreational (leisure) activities that causes small increases in breathing or heart rate like brisk walking, cycling or swimming for at least 10 minutes continuously?

P14.description: In a typical week, on how many days do you do moderate-intensity sports, fitness or recreational activities?
P14.codes: 0 None, 1 1 day, 2 2 days, 3 3 days, 4 4 days, 5 5 days, 6 6 days, 7 7 days

P15a.description: Hours doing moderate-intensity sports/fitness on a typical day

P15b.description: Minutes doing moderate-intensity sports/fitness on a typical day

run_jog.description: Did you do run/jogging over past 7 days

cycle.description: Did you do cycling over past 7 days

aerodance.description: Did you do aerobic/dancing over past 7 days

ballgame.description: Did you do ball sports over past 7 days

racquet.description: Did you do racquet sports over past 7 days

athletics.description: Did you do athletics over past 7 days

watersport.description: Did you do water sports over past 7 days

fightsport.description: Did you do fighting sports over past 7 days

sport_total.description: Total number of sport activities per week

sport_cat.description: Total number of sport activities per week by category

gpaq_sedent_h.description: Hours usually spent sitting or reclining on a typical day

gpaq_sedent_m.description: Converted minutes from hours usually spent sitting or reclining on a typical day

gpaq_sedent_m.1.description: Duplicate entry for converted minutes from hours usually spent sitting or reclining on a typical day

bmi_class_who.codes: 1 Underweight (<18.5), 2 Normal (18.5 to <25), 3 Overweight (25 to <30), 4 Obese (≥30)

panes1.description: In general, would you say that the people in your university are
panes1.codes: Very physically active (1), Somewhat physically active (2), Not very physically active (3), Not at all physically active (4), Don’t know/Not sure (5)

panes2.description: Overall, how would you rate your university
panes2.codes: Very pleasant (1), Somewhat pleasant (2), Not very pleasant (3), Not at all pleasant (4), Don’t know/Not sure (5)

panes3.description: For walking at night, would you describe the street lighting in your university as
panes3.codes: Very good (1), Good (2), Fair (3), Poor (4), Very poor (5), Don’t know/Not sure (6)

panes4.description: How safe from crime do you consider your university to be? Would you say
panes4.codes: Extremely safe (1), Quite safe (2), Slightly safe (3), Not at all safe (4), Don’t know/Not sure (5)

panes5.description: Generally speaking, would you say most people in your university can be trusted?

panes6.description: Does your university have any sidewalks and/or bike lanes?

panes7.description: Does your university have any bike racks or sheltered bike parking?

panes8.description: Do you use any private or membership-only recreation facilities in your university for physical activity?
panes8.codes: Yes (1), No (2), My university does not have these facilities (3), Don’t know/Not sure (4)

panes9.description: Do you use walking trails, parks, playgrounds, sport fields in your university for physical activity?
panes9.codes: Yes (1), No (2), My university does not have these facilities (3), Don’t know/Not sure (4)

panes10.description: Do you use minimarts in your university for physical activity and/or walking programs?
panes10.codes: Yes (1), No (2), My university does not have any minimarts (3), Don’t know/Not sure (4)

P15a_min.description: Converted minutes from hours doing moderate-intensity sports/fitness on a typical day

mvpa_total_min.description: Total minutes of moderate to vigorous physical activity

P12a_min.description: Converted minutes from hours doing vigorous sports/fitness on a typical day

P9a_min.description: Converted minutes from hours walking/bicycling for travel on a typical day

P3a_min.description: Converted minutes from hours of vigorous-intensity activities at university on a typical day

ballgame_wkdy.description: For each activity complete the days and time when you participated. - How many times on Monday - Friday - Ball sports e.g. soccer, basketball, and rattan ball

fightsport_wkend.description: For each activity complete the days and time when you participated. - How many times on Saturday-Sunday - Fighting sports e.g. taekwondo, fencing, boxing

aerodance_wkend.description: For each activity complete the days and time when you participated. - How many times on Saturday-Sunday - Aerobic incl. dancing

cycle_wkend.description: For each activity complete the days and time when you participated. - How many times on Saturday-Sunday - Cycling

run_jog_wkend_t.description: For each activity complete the days and time when you participated. - How long did you do it in total? - Run/jogging

cycle_wkdy_t.description: For each activity complete the days and time when you participated. - How long did you do it in total? - Cycling

aerodance_wkdy_t.description: For each activity complete the days and time when you participated. - How long did you do it in total? - Aerobic incl. dancing

athletics_wkdy.description: For each activity complete the days and time when you participated. - How many times on Monday - Friday - Athletics e.g. racing, broad jump, and discus throwing

watersport_wkend.description: For each activity complete the days and time when you participated. - How many times on Saturday-Sunday - Water sports (in pool or natural resources) e.g. swimming, water polo and sailing

racquet_wkdy_t.description: For each activity complete the days and time when you participated. - How long did you do it in total? - Racquet sports e.g. tennis, baseball, table tennis, golf, softball and hockey

run_jog_wkend.description: For each activity complete the days and time when you participated. - How many times on Saturday-Sunday - Run/jogging
